verses.verse: And <WG2532> after<WG3326> these things<WG5023> I heard<WG191> a great<WG3173> voice<WG5456> of much<WG4183> people<WG3793> in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> saying,<WG3004> Alleluia;<WG239> Salvation,<WG4991> and<WG2532> glory,<WG1391> and<WG2532> honor,<WG5092> and<WG2532> power,<WG1411> unto the Lord<WG2962> our<WG2257> God: <WG2316>

For <WG3754> true<WG228> and<WG2532> righteous<WG1342> are his<WG848> judgments:<WG2920> for<WG3754> he hath judged<WG2919> the<WG3588> great<WG3173> whore,<WG4204> which<WG3748> did corrupt<WG5351> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> with<WG1722> her<WG848> fornication,<WG4202> and<WG2532> hath avenged<WG1556> the<WG3588> blood<WG129> of his<WG848> servants<WG1401> at<WG1537> her<WG848> hand.<WG5495>
And <WG2532> again<WG1208> they said,<WG2046> Alleluia.<WG239> And<WG2532> her<WG848> smoke<WG2586> rose up<WG305> forever and ever.<WG1519> <WG165> <WG165>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> four and twenty<WG5064> <WG2532> <WG1501> elders<WG4245> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> four<WG5064> beasts<WG2226> fell down<WG4098> and<WG2532> worshiped<WG4352> God<WG2316> that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> throne,<WG2362> saying,<WG3004> Amen;<WG281> Alleluia.<WG239>

And <WG2532> a voice<WG5456> came<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> throne,<WG2362> saying,<WG3004> Praise<WG134> our<WG2257> God,<WG2316> all<WG3956> ye his<WG848> servants,<WG1401> and<WG2532> ye that fear<WG5399> him,<WG846> both<WG2532> small<WG3398> and<WG2532> great.<WG3173>

And <WG2532> I heard<WG191> as it were<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of a great<WG4183> multitude,<WG3793> and<WG2532> as<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of many<WG4183> waters,<WG5204> and<WG2532> as<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of mighty<WG2478> thunderings,<WG1027> saying,<WG3004> Alleluia:<WG239> for<WG3754> the Lord<WG2962> God<WG2316> omnipotent<WG3841> reigneth.<WG936>

Let us be glad<WG5463> and<WG2532> rejoice,<WG21> and<WG2532> give<WG1325> honor<WG1391> to him:<WG846> for<WG3754> the<WG3588> marriage<WG1062> of the<WG3588> Lamb<WG721> is come,<WG2064> and<WG2532> his<WG848> wife<WG1135> hath made herself ready.<WG2090> <WG1438>

And <WG2532> to her<WG846> was granted<WG1325> that<WG2443> she should be arrayed<WG4016> in fine linen,<WG1039> clean<WG2513> and<WG2532> white:<WG2986> for<WG1063> the<WG3588> fine linen<WG1039> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> righteousness<WG1345> of saints.<WG40>

And <WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto me,<WG3427> Write,<WG1125> Blessed<WG3107> are they which are called<WG2564> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> marriage<WG1062> supper<WG1173> of the<WG3588> Lamb.<WG721> And<WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto me,<WG3427> These<WG3778> are<WG1526> the<WG3588> true<WG228> sayings<WG3056> of God.<WG2316>

And <WG2532> I fell<WG4098> at<WG1715> his<WG848> feet<WG4228> to worship<WG4352> him.<WG846> And<WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto me,<WG3427> See<WG3708> thou do it not:<WG3361> I am<WG1510> thy<WG4675> fellow servant,<WG4889> and<WG2532> of thy<WG4675> brethren<WG80> that have<WG2192> the<WG3588> testimony<WG3141> of Jesus:<WG2424> worship<WG4352> God:<WG2316> for<WG1063> the<WG3588> testimony<WG3141> of Jesus<WG2424> is the<WG3588> spirit<WG4151> of prophecy.<WG4394>

And <WG2532> I saw<WG1492> heaven<WG3772> opened,<WG455> and<WG2532> behold<WG2400> a white<WG3022> horse;<WG2462> and<WG2532> he that sat<WG2521> upon<WG1909> him<WG846> was called<WG2564> Faithful<WG4103> and<WG2532> True,<WG228> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> righteousness<WG1343> he doth judge<WG2919> and<WG2532> make war.<WG4170>

<WG1161> His<WG848> eyes<WG3788> were as<WG5613> a flame<WG5395> of fire,<WG4442> and<WG2532> on<WG1909> his<WG848> head<WG2776> were many<WG4183> crowns;<WG1238> and he had<WG2192> a name<WG3686> written,<WG1125> that<WG3739> no man<WG3762> knew,<WG1492> but<WG1508> he himself.<WG848>
And <WG2532> he was clothed with<WG4016> a vesture<WG2440> dipped<WG911> in blood:<WG129> and<WG2532> his<WG848> name<WG3686> is called<WG2564> The<WG3588> Word<WG3056> of God.<WG2316>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> armies<WG4753> which were in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> followed<WG190> him<WG846> upon<WG1909> white<WG3022> horses,<WG2462> clothed in<WG1746> fine linen,<WG1039> white<WG3022> and<WG2532> clean.<WG2513>

And <WG2532> out of<WG1537> his<WG848> mouth<WG4750> goeth<WG1607> a sharp<WG3691> sword,<WG4501> that<WG2443> with<WG1722> it<WG846> he should smite<WG3960> the<WG3588> nations:<WG1484> and<WG2532> he<WG846> shall rule<WG4165> them<WG846> with<WG1722> a rod<WG4464> of iron:<WG4603> and<WG2532> he<WG846> treadeth<WG3961> the<WG3588> winepress<WG3025> <WG3631> of the<WG3588> fierceness<WG2372> and<WG2532> wrath<WG3709> of Almighty<WG3841> God.<WG2316>

And <WG2532> he hath<WG2192> on<WG1909> his vesture<WG2440> and<WG2532> on<WG1909> his<WG848> thigh<WG3382> a name<WG3686> written,<WG1125> KING<WG935> OF KINGS,<WG935> AND<WG2532> LORD<WG2962> OF LORDS.<WG2962>

And <WG2532> I saw<WG1492> an<WG1520> angel<WG32> standing<WG2476> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> sun;<WG2246> and<WG2532> he cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> saying<WG3004> to all<WG3956> the<WG3588> fowls<WG3732> that fly<WG4072> in<WG1722> the midst of heaven,<WG3321> Come<WG1205> and<WG2532> gather yourselves together<WG4863> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> supper<WG1173> of the<WG3588> great<WG3173> God;<WG2316>

That <WG2443> ye may eat<WG5315> the flesh<WG4561> of kings,<WG935> and<WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of captains,<WG5506> and<WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of mighty men,<WG2478> and<WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of horses,<WG2462> and<WG2532> of them that sit<WG2521> on<WG1909> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of all<WG3956> men, both free<WG1658> and<WG2532> bond,<WG1401> both<WG2532> small<WG3398> and<WG2532> great.<WG3173>

And <WG2532> I saw<WG1492> the<WG3588> beast,<WG2342> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> kings<WG935> of the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> their<WG848> armies,<WG4753> gathered together<WG4863> to make<WG4160> war<WG4171> against<WG3326> him that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> horse,<WG2462> and<WG2532> against<WG3326> his<WG848> army.<WG4753>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> beast<WG2342> was taken,<WG4084> and<WG2532> with<WG3326> him<WG5127> the<WG3588> false prophet<WG5578> that wrought<WG4160> miracles<WG4592> before<WG1799> him,<WG846> with<WG1722> which<WG3739> he deceived<WG4105> them that had received<WG2983> the<WG3588> mark<WG5480> of the<WG3588> beast,<WG2342> and<WG2532> them that worshiped<WG4352> his<WG848> image.<WG1504> These both<WG1417> were cast<WG906> alive<WG2198> into<WG1519> a lake<WG3041> of fire<WG4442> burning<WG2545> with<WG1722> brimstone.<WG2303>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> remnant<WG3062> were slain<WG615> with<WG1722> the<WG3588> sword<WG4501> of him that sat<WG2521> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> horse,<WG2462> which sword proceeded<WG1607> out of<WG1537> his<WG848> mouth:<WG4750> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> fowls<WG3732> were filled<WG5526> with<WG1537> their<WG848> flesh.<WG4561>
